metadata.title: CVE-2015-0819 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The UITour::onPageEvent function in Mozilla Firefox before 36.0 does notensure that an API call originates from a foreground tab, which allowsremote attackers to conduct spoofing and clickjacking attacks by leveragingaccess to a UI Tour web site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0819` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 36.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
firefox-globalmenu - 36.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
firefox-mozsymbols - 36.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
firefox-testsuite - 36.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '36.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.4').
